quest.33C16E82B90E5C1F.title: &fWelcome to &6Extreme Reactors&f!
quest.33C16E82B90E5C1F.quest_desc1: &6Extreme Reactors&r is a powerful energy mod where you can build custom multiblock &dReactors&r and &3Turbines&r to harness &6Nuclear Power&r!
quest.33C16E82B90E5C1F.quest_desc3: To get started, you'll need to craft some &6Uranium&r. This is the fuel and lifeblood of &dReactors&r!
chapter.2D069B87B860C09B.title: Extreme Reactors
quest.055F4DA6E97B36B9.title: &fYour First &dReactor
quest.055F4DA6E97B36B9.quest_desc1: For the final block of the basic Reactor, you'll need the &6Reactor Controller&r.
quest.055F4DA6E97B36B9.quest_desc3: With this, you are now ready to build your first &dReactor&r!
quest.055F4DA6E97B36B9.quest_desc5: To build your first &dReactor&r, start by setting up a 3x3x3 frame of &aCasings&r, where the bottom is entirely filled with &aCasings&r.
quest.055F4DA6E97B36B9.quest_desc7: With a 3x3x3 &dReactor&r, we only need 1 &eFuel Rod&r, and it will be placed in the center of the &dReactor&r with the &aControl Rod&r placed on top.
quest.055F4DA6E97B36B9.quest_desc9: On the front of the &dReactor&r, place down the &6Controller&r for easy access. The &bSolid Access Ports&r are placed on either side that is not a part of the frame. The last empty spot is for the &cActive Forge Energy Port&r to pump out power!
quest.055F4DA6E97B36B9.quest_desc11: If built correctly, the &dReactor&r multiblock should change textures and the &aController&r will present you with an interface when interacted with.
quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.title: &eModerators
quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.quest_desc1: A radiation &eModerator&r is a block or fluid that can be palced inside the &dReactor&r to absorb part of the radiation emitted by the fuel and move &cHeat&r away from the &aFuel Rods&r.
quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.quest_desc3: &eModerators&r vary in efficiency, but usually more rarer or more expensive blocks and fluids have better stats than common or cheap ones.
quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.quest_desc5: A &dReactor&r multiblock will not form if an invalid &eModerator&r is placed inside it.
quest.18A73FAF4D0F9F40.quest_desc7: Note: &3Graphite Blocks&r are great &eModerators&r to start out with!
task.2C1DE5245FEB3956.title: Examples of Moderators
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.title: &fPassive Or Active Reactors?
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc1: There are two types of &dReactors&r, and the type depends on how you choose to &bCool&r it!
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc3: &aPassive Cooling&r: Generates energy directly without any external medium.
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc5: This is your standard standalone &dReactor&r setup.
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc7: &aActive Cooling&r: Uses an external coolant to dissipate &cHeat&r.
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc9: In this case, the coolant will be vaporized and the vapor can be extracted from the &dReactor&r to drive the rotors of one or more &3Turbines&r.
quest.2CD606A9C5C786D8.quest_desc11: To convert a reactor to an &aActively Cooled Reactor&r, you will need a new port!
quest.07CC52EDB45C7994.title: &fMultiblock Sizes
quest.07CC52EDB45C7994.quest_desc1: All multiblocks have a size limit, and &dReactors&r and &3Turbines&r come in two different forms:
quest.07CC52EDB45C7994.quest_desc3: &aBasic Parts&r: Far cheaper to craft, making them ideal for early-game power generation.
quest.07CC52EDB45C7994.quest_desc5: &2Reinforced Parts&r: Allows you to build a much larger Reactors with more customization, but are more costly to make overall.
task.1A02CBDB99C6928B.title: &fBlock Variants
quest.5BBE73445913E9A3.title: &cReprocessor
quest.5BBE73445913E9A3.quest_desc1: Finally, we will need the &6Reprocessor Controller&r for the final block of this machine.
quest.5BBE73445913E9A3.quest_desc3: To build the &6Reprocessor&r, start by setting up a 3x3x7 frame of &aReprocessor Casings&r.
quest.5BBE73445913E9A3.quest_desc5: Now place the &aCollector&r in the middle of the bottom face, and the &aWaste Injector&r in the middle of the top face. All other blocks can be placed on any side that is not a part of the frame.
quest.5BBE73445913E9A3.quest_desc7: Once everything has been placed, fill in the rest of the structure with &aCasings&r.
quest.5BBE73445913E9A3.quest_desc9: If built correctly, the &cReprocessor&r multiblock should change textures and the &aController&r will present you with an interface when interacted with.
quest.5BBE73445913E9A3.quest_desc11: &eNote&r: Remember that you can check the guidebook at any point if you need a more in-depth explanation.
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.title: &fYour First &3Turbine
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc1: The final block needed to build a fully functional &3Turbine&r is the &6Turbine Controller&r. This is the block that you will interact with for the &3Turbine&r!
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc3: To build your first &3Turbine&r, start by setting up a 5 wide, 5 long, and 3 tall frame of &aTurbine Housings&r.
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc5: Fill in the bottom face with Housings, but make sure the bottom-middle block is a &aRotor Bearing&r.
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc7: Place your &aRotor Shaft&r in the middle, and then the 4 &aRotor Blades&r in each cardinal direction around it.
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc9: Fill in the ceiling blocks with &aHousings&r, and then you can place the &aController&f and the &bPorts&r on any side that is not a part of the frame.
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc11: Fill in any remaining spots with Housings or Turbine Glass to complete your &3Turbine&r!
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc13: If built correctly, the &3Turbine&r multiblock should change textures and the &aController&r will present you with an interface when interacted with.
quest.13F84B912C8FA7FD.quest_desc15: &eNote&r: Remember that you can check the guidebook at any point if you need a more in-depth explanation.
task.555B507B8B216CE2.title: &3Turbine &fControllers
quest.7876408A8635B7F6.title: &6Fluidizer
quest.7876408A8635B7F6.quest_desc1: With the &6Fluidizer Controller&r, it's time to build your first Fluidizer!
quest.7876408A8635B7F6.quest_desc3: To build your first &6Fluidizer&r, start by setting up a 3x3x3 frame of &aCasings&r. Now place the &aController&f, the &bPorts&r, and whichever &bInjectors&r are required for the setup you want on any side that is not a part of the frame, then fill in the rest of the sides with &aCasings&r.
quest.7876408A8635B7F6.quest_desc5: If built correctly, the &6Fluidizer&r multiblock should change textures and the &aController&r will present you with an interface when interacted with.
quest.7876408A8635B7F6.quest_desc7: You will need to build all three modes of this multiblock to reach the end of this mod.
quest.7876408A8635B7F6.quest_desc11: &eNote&r: Remember that you can check the guidebook at any point if you need a more in-depth explanation.
quest.62323F1906B5BE00.title: &2Energizer
quest.62323F1906B5BE00.quest_desc1: The &2Energizer&r is a multiblock structure that can be used to store massive amounts of energy.
quest.62323F1906B5BE00.quest_desc3: The outside must be entirely filled with &aCasings&r, except for where the &aController&r will go, and the inside must be completely filled with &bEnergy Cells&r.
quest.62323F1906B5BE00.quest_desc5: The &2Energizer's&r minimum size is 3x3x3, up to a maximum of 32x32x32.
quest.4BDC456540EBE648.title: &9Blutonium
quest.4BDC456540EBE648.quest_desc1: By reprocessing &bCyanite&r, we can make an even better fuel for our &dReactors&r called &9Blutonium&r.
quest.4BDC456540EBE648.quest_desc3: To craft &9Blutonium&r, insert two &bCyanite&r ingots and one bucket of water into a Reprocessor.
quest.45621893734C0B96.title: &5Magentite
quest.45621893734C0B96.quest_desc1: &5Magentite&r is produced as a waste product when &9Blutonium&r is used as fuel inside a standard &dReactor&r.
quest.39F711F28B0FCABA.title: &bCyanite&r
quest.39F711F28B0FCABA.quest_desc1: &bCyanite&r is the main waste byproduct when a passive &dReator&r burns Uranium fuel.
quest.39F711F28B0FCABA.quest_desc3: &bCyanite&r can be turned into &9Blutonium&r in a &6Reprocessor&r as a better fuel, but is also a needed material to craft parts for both types of Turbines and the &6Reprocessor&r itself.
quest.7476CC3F7F7F7B43.title: &2Verderium
quest.7476CC3F7F7F7B43.quest_desc1: To get &2Verderium&r, you will need to set up a &6Fluidizer&r in either &eMixing Mode&r and insert a 2-to-1 ratio of &aUranium&r and &9Blutonium&r.
quest.1134A9C11D1AD524.title: &cRossinite
quest.1134A9C11D1AD524.quest_desc1: To get &cRossinite&r, you will first need to build a fluid fueled &dReactor&r and power it with &2Verderium&r to convert its liquid form into its reactant form.
quest.1134A9C11D1AD524.quest_desc3: You can then repeat this process to turn &2Verderium Reactant&r into &cRossinite Reactant&r.
quest.1134A9C11D1AD524.quest_desc5: Finally, repeat this process one last time to turn &cRossinite Reactant&r into &cRossinite&r fluid.
quest.2C33DB689BC13D4E.title: &5Ludicrite
quest.2C33DB689BC13D4E.quest_desc1: To craft &5Ludicrite&r, insert two &9Blutonium&r ingots and one ingot's worth of &bLiquid Cyanite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.2C33DB689BC13D4E.quest_desc3: You'll need a &6Fluidizer&r built to &eSolid Mode&r to get &bLiquid Cyanite&r.
quest.1ED582363F67CF8C.title: &dRidiculite
quest.1ED582363F67CF8C.quest_desc1: To craft &dRidiculite&r, insert two &5Ludicrite&r ingots and one ingot's worth of &bLiquid &5Magentite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.1ED582363F67CF8C.quest_desc3: You'll need a &6Fluidizer&r built to &eSolid Mode&r to get &bLiquid &5Magentite&r.
quest.3985170CDB3A0BC3.title: &cInanite
quest.3985170CDB3A0BC3.quest_desc1: To craft &cInanite&r, insert two &dRidiculite&r ingots and one bucket of &bLiquid &cRossinite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.49C272F5ECDF9FA4.title: &aInsanite
quest.49C272F5ECDF9FA4.quest_desc1: To craft an &aInsanite Ingot&r, insert sixteen &bBenitoite&r and two buckets of &bLiquid &cRossinite&r into a reprocessor.
quest.49C272F5ECDF9FA4.quest_desc3: Combine 8 of these ingots with a block of &cInanite&r to create an &6Insanite Block&r.
quest.49C272F5ECDF9FA4.quest_desc5: &6Insanite&r has the best performance out of all other blocks when used within your &dReactors&r or as &3Turbine Coils&r.
quest.3E25EAA3D2851941.title: &dReactor &bCasings
quest.3E25EAA3D2851941.quest_desc1: Before we build out our first &dReactor&r, it's worth noting that there are two types of blocks: &bBasic&r and &aReinforced&r.
quest.3E25EAA3D2851941.quest_desc3: For your first Reactor, it's best to use just the Basic blocks!
quest.3E25EAA3D2851941.quest_desc5: &bReactor Casings&r are used to build the structural frame of the &dReactor&r multiblock.
quest.3E25EAA3D2851941.quest_desc7: &bReactor Glass&r can be used on non-frame blocks when building &dReactors&r.
quest.3E25EAA3D2851941.quest_desc9: Basic &dReactors&r can be as small as 3x3x3, but have a max size of 5x5x5. To build a bigger &dReactor&r, you will need Reinforced blocks.
quest.1839CCDAC3346C27.title: &fFueling The &dReactor
quest.1839CCDAC3346C27.quest_desc1: &bFuel Rods&r are where your &dReactor&r stores its fuel. The more &bFuel Rods&r you have, the more fuel will be needed to completely fill it.
quest.1839CCDAC3346C27.quest_desc3: &bControl Rods&r allow you to control the &eInjection Rate&r, which is how fast your &dReactor&r burns through fuel. This directly affects your power generation. Burning more fuel generally generates more power.
quest.1839CCDAC3346C27.quest_desc5: &bControl Rods&r are placed on the ceiling of the &dReactor&r, with &bFuel Rods&r extending from it all the way down to the bottom of the Reactor.
quest.1839CCDAC3346C27.quest_desc7: For example, a 5x5x5 &dReactor&r will have a total of 3 &bFuel Rods&r extending from a &bControl Rod&r placed at the top.
quest.12BBDC662C7D6622.title: &dReactor &fPorts
quest.12BBDC662C7D6622.quest_desc1: &bPorts&r are how you interact with your &dReactor&r! These are placed somewhere allong one of the side walls.
quest.12BBDC662C7D6622.quest_desc3: The &bSolid Access Port&r allows you to insert &6Uranium Ingots&r as fuel directly into your &dReactor&r to power it, as well as exporting any byproducts from the &dReactor&r.
quest.12BBDC662C7D6622.quest_desc5: While you can get by with only one, it's worth having 2 for both input and output control.
quest.12BBDC662C7D6622.quest_desc7: The &bActive FE Power Tap&r allows you to draw out energy from your &dReactor&r. The Active part means that it will automatically try to push out power.
quest.12BBDC662C7D6622.quest_desc9: The &bRedstone Port&r, while optional, allows you to control the status of your &dReactor&r with redstone, allowing for some automation.
quest.12BBDC662C7D6622.quest_desc11: There are many more &bPorts&r that you will need when building more complex systems, some allowing even more control over your Reactors!
quest.617363DDAA59D686.title: &fBuild A Reinforced &dReactor &fNext!
quest.617363DDAA59D686.quest_desc1: If you're wanting to build an even bigger reactor, then it's time to free yourself from the limitations of the &eBasic&r blocks!
quest.617363DDAA59D686.quest_desc3: With &bReinforced&r blocks, you can build your Reactor up to the max size of 32x32x48.
quest.617363DDAA59D686.quest_desc5: &eNote&r: Basic &dReactors&r can only be Passively cooled!
quest.24651265607A772B.title: &6Fluidizer &fWalls
quest.24651265607A772B.quest_desc1: The &6Fluidizer&r is a custom-size multiblock machine that creates Fluids from items or other fluids.
quest.24651265607A772B.quest_desc3: Before building the &6Fluidizer&r, it's important to understand the different ways you can build it, as it has three operational modes.
quest.24651265607A772B.quest_desc5: Just like the Reactor, the &6Fluidizer&r frame is made up of &aFluidizer Casings&r. This multiblock has a minimum size of 3x3x3.
quest.2118F7E7DA50BE2E.title: &6Fluidizer &fModes
quest.2118F7E7DA50BE2E.quest_desc1: If you want to turn items or fluids into a new fluid fuel type, it all depends on how many Injectors you use when you build the Fluidizer!
quest.2118F7E7DA50BE2E.quest_desc3: &eSolid Mode&r turns a single solid fuel source (like ingots) into fluid fuel. This requires &lonly one&r &bSolid Injector&r.
quest.2118F7E7DA50BE2E.quest_desc5: &eSolid Mixing Mode&r turns two solid fuel sources and mixes them to create a new fluid fuel type. This requires &lonly two&r &bSolid Injectors&r.
quest.2118F7E7DA50BE2E.quest_desc7: &eFluid Mixing Mode&r mixes two fluid fuels into a new fuel type. This requires &ltwo&r &bFluid Injectors&r in the multiblock.
quest.78FEB17736D2E8C5.title: &6Fluidizer &bPorts
quest.78FEB17736D2E8C5.quest_desc1: Aside from how you choose to import items or fluids, the &6Fluidizer&r needs power to function.
quest.78FEB17736D2E8C5.quest_desc3: To import power, you will need to make a &cFluidizer Energy Port&r.
quest.78FEB17736D2E8C5.quest_desc5: To extract the new fluid out of the multiblock, you will need the &bFluidizer Output Port&r.
quest.78FEB17736D2E8C5.quest_desc7: Both of these ports can be placed on any face as long as it is not a part of the frame.
quest.52B005DF145A5707.title: &3Turbine &fWalls
quest.52B005DF145A5707.quest_desc1: The &3Turbine&r is a multiblock machine that spins &bRotors&r using &bSteam&r from an &bActively Cooled Reactor&r to generate energy.
quest.52B005DF145A5707.quest_desc3: This multiblock uses &aHousings&r that make up the frame of the &3Turbine&r.
quest.52B005DF145A5707.quest_desc5: For this quest, we'll be making the smallest Basic &3Turbine&r, which is 5x5x3, but they can be built up to 5x5x10.
quest.52B005DF145A5707.quest_desc7: A &2Reinforced &3Turbine&r can be as big as 32x32x32.
quest.52B005DF145A5707.quest_desc9: You will need at least 64 &aHousings&r to build your first &3Turbine&r.
task.081862F8BA857882.title: &3Turbine &fWalls
quest.0B7AD8830F63CC2A.title: &3Turbine &fRotors
quest.0B7AD8830F63CC2A.quest_desc1: &bRotors&r are a core part of your &3Turbine&r setup.
quest.0B7AD8830F63CC2A.quest_desc3: These are placed in the middle of the Turbine, with the &bRotor Shafts&r extending from one side to the other.
quest.0B7AD8830F63CC2A.quest_desc5: On one side of the &3Turbine&r, the &aTurbine Rotor Bearing&r must be placed on the outer wall of the &3Turbine&r.
quest.0B7AD8830F63CC2A.quest_desc7: You will need to place at least four &bRotor Blades&r around each &bRotor Shaft&r.
task.287383C50A51C925.title: &fRotor Bearings
task.3ECDB56A4577AB1E.title: &fRotor Shafts
task.37E5BA11AD84D7AF.title: &fRotor Blades
quest.5CCCCC773275CFAC.title: &3Turbine &bPorts
quest.5CCCCC773275CFAC.quest_desc1: Just like the &dReactor&r, you will need an &cEnergy Port&r to export the power that the &3Turbine&r makes.
quest.5CCCCC773275CFAC.quest_desc3: To give the &3Turbine&r fuel to spin, you will need to import &bSteam&r from your &aActively Cooled Reactor&r into a &6Turbine Active Forge Fluid Port&r.
quest.5CCCCC773275CFAC.quest_desc5: These can be placed on any face of the &3Turbine&r walls.
task.327E3C53D0FEA46E.title: &3Turbine &fEnergy Port
task.20F7D4F697921733.title: &3Turbine &fActive Fluid Port
quest.11C6F6554654573A.title: &3Turbine &dInduction Coils
quest.11C6F6554654573A.quest_desc1: While not needed in the smaller &3Turbine&r setups, &dInduction Coils&r help generate power within your &3Turbine&r.
quest.11C6F6554654573A.quest_desc3: They are (usually) metallic blocks that can be placed around your &aRotor Shaft&r near the &aHousing&r to extract rotational energy.
quest.11C6F6554654573A.quest_desc5: You can place up to three rings of &dCoils&r, but smaller setups will likely benefit more from having less rings.
quest.11C6F6554654573A.quest_desc7: You can also mix &dCoil&r types, allowing you to slowly upgrade your &3Turbine&r as you unlock better quality items.
task.3D88835E5FF00CFE.title: Induction Coil Blocks
quest.22A060CE1CD96EE5.title: &cReprocessor &fWalls
quest.22A060CE1CD96EE5.quest_desc1: To process byproducts of &dReactors&r, we'll need a new multiblock called the &6Reprocessor&r.
quest.22A060CE1CD96EE5.quest_desc3: Unlike the other multliblocks in this mod, the &6Reprocessor&r is a set size of 3x3x7.
quest.22A060CE1CD96EE5.quest_desc5: The frame must be made out of &6Reprocessor Casings&r.
quest.558971F923A3C186.title: &cReprocessor &bPorts
quest.558971F923A3C186.quest_desc1: The &6Reprocessor&r needs power to function, so it will need a &cPower Port&r placed on any vertical face on the multiblock.
quest.558971F923A3C186.quest_desc3: To output items from the &6Reprocessor&r, you will need to place an &aOutput Port&r on any vertical face as well.
quest.506DDFCF6639744D.title: &fInjectors \&\ Collector
quest.506DDFCF6639744D.quest_desc1: When built, the &6Reprocessor&r will look like a tower. To inject and eject products into the multiblock, you will need several ports that are placed in exact parts of the build.
quest.506DDFCF6639744D.quest_desc3: The &aReprocessor Collector&r is placed on the middle of the bottom face of the multiblock, and collects materials within the &6Reprocessor&r.
quest.506DDFCF6639744D.quest_desc5: The &aWaste Injector&r must be placed in the middle of the top face of the multiblock, and is where you'll import byproducts like &bCyanite&r Ingots.
quest.506DDFCF6639744D.quest_desc7: On any vertical face, the &aFluid Injector&r is used to pump in fluids.
